snippet.title: Doodle God Universe | Apple Arcade | Official 4K Trailer
snippet.description:
The award winning series is expanding its universe with a new remastered Doodle God Universe on Apple Arcade!
Link to the game: http://apple.co/-DoodleGod

Players take on the role of the Creator, combining different elements to create new worlds via fun puzzles and world building gameplay. They’ll start out by combining the four elements (air, water, fire & earth) as they set out to build their very own Universe. As elements are combined, new elements are created, and when combined successfully, the planet will grow into a living world. Players will progress through the game with a gusto as they will need to have all their creative wits to ultimately complete the puzzle — and the whole world. Not to mention supporting the Life itself.

Created by JoyBits.

#doodlegod #doodle #AppleArcade #universe #joybits #apple
